New Records: Corey Seager's homer was the hardest-hit World Series homer in the Statcast era
Texas Rangers are the first team in major league history to win their first nine road games in one postseason
Key Match Events: Corey Seager hit a two-run homer in the third inning
Nathaniel Lowe hit a leadoff double and scored on a two-out single by Semien in the third inning
Geraldo Perdomo hit an RBI single in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Seager expressed his excitement about playing at this level in October
Marcus Semien discussed the importance of the team's depth in the face of injuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adolis García threw a stellar throw from right field to cut down Christian Walker at the plate
Josh Jung made a strong throw to beat Alek Thomas
Others: Max Scherzer threw three scoreless innings before leaving with back tightness
Jon Gray, Josh Sborz, Aroldis Chapman and José Leclerc combined to keep Arizona's offense quiet most of the evening
